thread.title: BRIEF-Gap Announces Departure Of Gap Brand President

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gap Announces Departure Of Gap Brand President

organizations.name: brief-gap announces departure of gap brand

text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Gap Inc:
* GAP INC. ANNOUNCES DEPARTURE OF GAP BRAND PRESIDENT * GAP INC. ANNOUNCES DEPARTURE OF GAP BRAND PRESIDENT * GAP INC - ‍JEFF KIRWAN, PRESIDENT AND CEO OF GAP BRAND, WILL LEAVE COMPANY​
* GAP INC - ‍A SEARCH IS UNDERWAY FOR A NEW PRESIDENT OF GAP BRAND; IN INTERIM, BRENT HYDER, WILL OVERSEE BRAND​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
